name: Satisfaction of Sated Thirst
description: Small round chairs found in Sumeru City's taverns. They are often placed next to the bar table to seat solo diners. For those tired after a busy day at work, the prime choice for relaxation is to have some drinks and a hearty meal without any interruptions. Just remember that too much alcohol is bad for your health. If you feel like you're wobbling while sitting on one of these round chairs, it'd be wise to stop drinking...
